metadata.description: Identifier for the project, application or customer -=- PLEASE ONLY USE LOWER CASE AND NUMBERS -=-
Can one of the following, dev-test-acc-prod
Storage Account name to be created (all lower, no special characters) -=- PLEASE ONLY USE LOWER CASE AND NUMBERS -=-
Azure Monitor Log Analytics Workspace Name
Azure Monitor Log Analytics Workspace Resource Group
Computername of the server endpoint (cache server)
Unique number to add to the name of the accounts.

variables.TemplateUsage: Used to create file monitoring config

resources.name: [variables('ActionGroupName')]
[concat('AFS - File services availability (', parameters('StorAcctName'), ')')]
[concat('AFS - Storage account availability (', parameters('StorAcctName'), ')')]
[concat('AFS - File capacity - Warning (', parameters('StorAcctName'), ')')]
[concat('AFS - File capacity - Critical (', parameters('StorAcctName'), ')')]
[concat('AFS - A connection with the service could not be established (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

properties.description: This error can occur whenever the Azure File Sync service is inaccessible from the server.

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x80072ee7"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]

resources.name: [concat('AFS - Sync can not access the Azure file share specified in the cloud endpoint (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

properties.description: This error occurs because the Azure File Sync agent cannot access the Azure file share, which may be because the Azure file share or the storage account hosting it no longer exists.

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x80c8305f"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]

resources.name: [concat('AFS - Sync failed because the request is not authorized to perform this operation (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

properties.description: This error occurs because the Azure File Sync agent is not authorized to access the Azure file share.

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x80c86044"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]

resources.name: [concat('AFS - The storage account name used could not be resolved (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x80C83060"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]

resources.name: [concat('AFS - An unknown error occured while accessing the storage account (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x80c8308a"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]

resources.name: [concat('AFS - Sync failed due to storage account locked (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

properties.description: This error occurs because the storage account has a read-only resource lock.

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x80c83092"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]

resources.name: [concat('AFS - Sync failed due to a problem with the sync database (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

properties.description: This error occurs when there is a problem with the internal database used by Azure File Sync.

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x8e5e044e"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]

resources.name: [concat('AFS - You reached the Azure file share storage limit (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

properties.description: This error occurs when the Azure file share storage limit has been reached, which can happen if a quota is applied for an Azure file share or if the usage exceeds the limits for an Azure file share.

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x80c8603e"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]

resources.name: [concat('AFS - The Azure file share cannot be found (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

properties.description: This error occurs when the Azure file share is not accessible.

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x80c86030"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]

resources.name: [concat('AFS - Sync failed due to a problem with authentication (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

properties.description: This error typically occurs because the server time is incorrect.

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x80c80300"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]

resources.name: [concat('AFS - Sync failed due to authentication identity not found (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

properties.description: This error occurs because the server endpoint deletion failed and the endpoint is now in a partially deleted state.

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x80c83079"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]

resources.name: [concat('AFS - The volume where the server endpoint is located is low on disk space (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

properties.description: This error occurs because the volume has filled up. This error commonly occurs because files outside the server endpoint are using up space on the volume.

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x8e5e0211" or EventData contains "0x80c8031a"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]

resources.name: [concat('AFS - Sync failed due to problems with many individual files (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

properties.description: In cases where there are many per file sync errors, sync sessions may begin to fail.

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x80c8023b" or EventData contains "0x80c8021c" or EventData contains "0x80c80253"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]

resources.name: [concat('AFS - Sync failed due to a problem with the server endpoint path (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x80c80019"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]

resources.name: [concat('AFS - The service is currently unavailable (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

properties.description: This error occurs because the Azure File Sync service is unavailable.

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x80c8004b"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]

resources.name: [concat('AFS - Sync failed due to an exception (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

properties.description: This error occurs because sync failed due to an exception.

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x80131500"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]

resources.name: [concat('AFS - Sync failed because permissions on the System Volume Information folder are incorrect (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

properties.description: This error can occur if the NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM account does not have permissions to the System Volume Information folder on the volume where the server endpoint is located.

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x80c8027e"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]

resources.name: [concat('AFS - Sync failed because the Azure file share was deleted and recreated (', variables('ServerEndpoint'), ')')]

properties.description: This error occurs because Azure File Sync does not support deleting and recreating an Azure file share in the same sync group.

source.Query:
[concat('let ServerEndpoint = "', variables('ServerEndpoint'), '";
Event
| where (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Agent") or (Source == "Microsoft-FileSync-Management")
| where Computer == ServerEndpoint
| where EventLevelName == "Error"
| where EventData contains "0x80c8027e"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated desc
')]
